title: What are the differences between moral and a non-moral? - Quora

response.answer_text: Moral issues involve harm or gain to a moral agent by another moral agent. Non-moral issues have no harm or gain to any other moral agent. So hitting someone is a moral issue, as is saving them from drowning. What color shirt you wear on a given day however is a non-moral issue.

Morality is rooted in the law of God. Hence a person who commits adultery and breaks a law of God is immoral. The non-moral which is immoral is what strays from the will of God and the law of God. Actually, you can find the definition of immoral in the definition of moral.
